Header.title: We are
Header.paragraph: Turning your Instagram Into a Website In a Moment

About.paragraph: We are not a website company. We are a group of people who love to make websites. We use our skills and your photos to make instagram profiles into beautiful sites.

Services.name: Site Development
Services.text: We take an instagram profile and turn it into a fast, 100% responsive, SEO friendly and fully designed website.

Services.name: AI site updater
Services.text: Our AI sees when you upload a new post/photo and each day updates your site accordingly.

Services.name: Site hosting
Services.text: Free site hosting forever! no questions and no terms, with an option to switch to a custom domain.
